intro: Avenastrum, commonly known as goat's beard, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. It is characterized by its tall, branched stems and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. The leaves are typically lance-shaped and often have a hairy texture. Avenastrum species are native to temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere. These plants are often found in meadows, along roadsides, and in disturbed soils.
